> Each quarter, Akamai publishes its "State of the Internet" report, based on data gathered across Akamaiâ€™s global server network. "State of the Internet" highlights attack traffic, connection speeds, Internet penetration, broadband adoption, and mobile usage, as well as trends seen in this data over time.
